reviewText: This DVD has saved my Saltwater Aquarium.  Asking store owners and others that have an aquarium just wasn't quite enough.  But this DVD taught me what I needed to do to keep not only my corals alive but how to get my entire aquarium thriving.  The best part is I can watch it again and again for a refresher.  Carson Passey explains everything in lamens terms, he knows what he is talking about.  I would highly recommend this to anyone interested in taking their saltwater aquarium to the next level.
